languages.text: "Знаете, шерин, когда питомец перестает подчиняться, его обычно сажают в клетку. Или делают прекрасное чучело — на худой конец".
"You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."
languages.original_text: "Знаете, шерин, когда питомец перестает подчиняться, его обычно сажают в клетку. Или делают прекрасное чучело — на худой конец".

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually get put in a cage at best or get turned into a lovely stuffed animal at worst."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually get put in a cage at best or get turned into a lovely stuffed animal at worst."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，要我说，如果宠物不听话，好一点儿的，就把她关进笼子，坏一点儿的，就把她做成漂亮的标本。”
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，要我说，如果宠物不听话，好一点儿的，就把她关进笼子，坏一点儿的，就把她做成漂亮的标本。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Sabe, shereen? Cuando una mascota se niega a obedecer a su amo, en el mejor de los casos acaba metida en una jaula, y en el peor se convierte en un bonito adorno de taxidermia».
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe, shereen? Cuando una mascota se niega a obedecer a su amo, en el mejor de los casos acaba metida en una jaula, y en el peor se convierte en un bonito adorno de taxidermia».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez, shereen, quand un animal refuse d'obéir à son maître, deux options s'offrent à lui : un petit séjour en cage ou une transformation en carpette. »
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, shereen, quand un animal refuse d'obéir à son maître, deux options s'offrent à lui : un petit séjour en cage ou une transformation en carpette. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, Shereen, wenn ein Haustier nicht gehorcht, kommt es bestenfalls in einen Käfig oder wird schlimmstenfalls ausgestopft."
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, Shereen, wenn ein Haustier nicht gehorcht, kommt es bestenfalls in einen Käfig oder wird schlimmstenfalls ausgestopft."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン、ペットが主人に従わない場合、普通は良くて檻に入れられるか、運が悪ければ、可愛い剥製にされるものでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、ペットが主人に従わない場合、普通は良くて檻に入れられるか、運が悪ければ、可愛い剥製にされるものでしょう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bir evcil hayvan, sahibinin sözünü dinlemezse en iyi ihtimalle bir kafese koyulur, en kötü ihtimalle de güzel bir tahnit parçası olur şirinim."
languages.original_text: "You know, shereen, when a pet refuses to obey their master, they are usually put in a cage at best or turned into a lovely piece of taxidermy at worst."

traits.locale_text: "Bir evcil hayvan sahibinin sözünü dinlemezse en iyi ihtimalle bir kafese koyulur, en kötü ihtimalle de güzel bir tahnit parçası olur şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
